page.title: 04LANIVET C.P. SCHOOL cont.
page.content: A long time ago there was a high wall to separate the girls and infants from the boys. Today the wall has gone and the children play together in one large playground. Last year we had some alterations. We now have a good library and an office. Some of our new equipment was bought by the{P.T.A.}We have just done a Cowboy Concert for the parents. It was a lot of fun! We had a Cowboy Supper afterwards and put straw on the floor. We ate sausages, potatoes and beans, biscuits and coffee. Outside we have a{Rural Studies {Garden.}We all plant things.The infants have grown sweetpeas. Class 3 has taken cuttings and grown trees from seeds.The false acacia trees grew the best.Class 2 did tests to see what helps seeds and plants to grow.
